title: Victory Day: Metro rail services to halt for 40 minutes tomorrow for parachute display
body: Metro rail services will remain suspended for 40 minutes tomorrow (December 16) due to a parachute jump programme in Dhaka marking the Victory Day. The decision was announced today through a post on the verified Facebook page of Dhaka Mass Transit Company Limited (DMTCL). According to the notice, metro rail operations will be halted from 11:50am to 12:30pm. The suspension will be enforced to ensure the safety of paratroopers during a parachute display scheduled to take place in the Tejgaon old airport area. The metro rail authority apologised to passengers for the temporary inconvenience and said services would resume as normal immediately after the designated time.
